text: @realDonaldTrump Too Little Too Late Donny boy a 2017 103 page report by the Pentagon predicted a Coronavirus outbreak and said we weren’t prepared! It was your job to make sure we were the prepared. You failed to get us prepared to deal with Coronavirus epidemic when you knew it was coming.
